author: Special Correspondent
text:
A flying squad attached to Mannargudi assembly constituency in Tiruvarur district seized cheques for Rs. 7 lakhs from a micro finance institution at Mannargudi which were meant for distribution to self help groups in that town and its vicinity on Tuesday.

The seizure was made based on a tip off to the election officials.

The information was that some self-help groups had assembled at the Impact Micro Finance Institution apparently to receive the cheques. Sources said acting on the information, the Flying Squad went to the office and seized 37 cheques for Rs. 7 lakhs.

The cheques were seized and a complaint was lodged by the Flying Squad to the local police.

The sources said micro finance institutions were prohibited from handing over cheques to self-help groups.
title: Cheques meant for distribution to SHGs seized
